used.from sentence: In our experiments , we used Matlab 2017a and the Mat - ConvNet toolbox 2 .

only use one GPU card.from sentence: Note that we only use one GPU card for measuring the run time .

network training.from sentence: We set the weight decay to 5 10 ? 4 , momentum to 0.9 and batch size to 8 for network training .

convolutional layer.from sentence: For the convolutional layer , we used 3 3 kernels with the stride of 1 .

proposed PDB strategy.from sentence: For the proposed PDB strategy , the number of bins K was set to 17 for AFLW and 9 for 300W .

CNN - 6.from sentence: For CNN - 6 , the input image size is 64 64 3 . We reduced the learning rate from 3 10 ? 6 to 3 10 ?8 for the L2 loss , and from 3 10 ?5 to 3 10 ? 7 for the other loss functions .

random translations.from sentence: For bounding box perturbation , we applied random translations to the upper-left and bottom - right corners of the face bounding box within 5 % of the bounding .

parameters.from sentence: The parameters of the Wing loss were set tow = 10 and = 2 . For CNN - 7 , the input image size is 128 128 3 . We reduced the learning rate from 1 10 ? 6 to 1 10 ?8 for the L2 loss , and from 1 10 ? 5 to 1 10 ? 7 for the other loss functions .

with: 4 NVIDIA GeForce GTX Titan X ( Pascal ) cards

training and testing.from sentence: The training and testing of our networks were conducted on a server running Ubuntu 16.04 with 2 Intel Xeon E5-2667 v4 CPU , 256 GB RAM and 4 NVIDIA GeForce GTX Titan X ( Pascal ) cards .

Each model.from sentence: Each model was trained for 120 k iterations .

Max pooling.from sentence: The standard ReLu function was used for nonlinear activation , and Max pooling with the stride of 2 was used to downsize feature maps .

randomly injected.from sentence: Last , we randomly injected Gaussian blur (? = 1 ) to each training image with the probability of 50 % .

data augmentation.from sentence: To perform data augmentation , we randomly rotated each training image between [ ? 30 , 30 ] degrees for CNN - 6 and between [ ? 10 , 10 ] degrees for CNN - 7 .
